TopicTitle: Where can I find black space suits?

Articles.Content:
I've downloaded the Texture Replacer mod and I've loaded a bunch of space suit skins, but every one that has black suits either has a broken link or the skins have every other color besides black.  Does anyone know where I can find a black space suit plug-in?

- Jett
That question is probably best asked in the Texture Replacer mod thread. Suit retextures are rarely ever discussed outside of it.
